segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Congratulations! You have won $50,000 in our international lottery. Your number was randomly selected.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: Really? I never entered any lottery. How is this possible?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: Your phone number was automatically entered. You just need to pay processing fees of $500 to claim your prize.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: I need to pay money to get money? That doesn't sound right.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_1
segments.text: It's standard procedure sir. We need to verify your identity and process the transfer.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_2
segments.text: I'm not comfortable with this. I'll pass on the prize.
